name: Diamond Stone Rescue-Luxurious House
description:
Diamond Stone Rescue is a strategy game.
Some thieves have stored diamond in the house.Try to take it out.So,first you can find out the some hints and to solve some interesting puzzles.

Game Features:
- The motivation of this game has to escape with diamond
- Some thieves have stored diamond,try to take it out
- Use your fantasy skills
- Find out the some hints
- Solve some interesting puzzles
